abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "TaxonKey is Macropis nuda (Provancher, 1882)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Texas A&M University Insect Collection 1 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Insect, Arachnid and Myriapod Collection 2 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 5 records from University of New Hamsphire Collection of Insects and other Arthropods 6 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 6 records from Bees of Canada / Gschwendtner property collection 8 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 21 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 34 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection 68 records from Bee Biology and Systematics Laboratory 121 records from A new western Canadian record of Epeoloides pilosulus (Cresson) 429 records from hymenoptera
